        Returns:

      • getMessage

                          java.lang.Throwable exception)
        Extract message from the given exception chain. All messages from all exceptions are concatenated to the resulted string.
        Parameters:
        message - prefixed message text which will be in the start of resulted string
        exception - converted exception
        Returns:
        resulted overall message
